file_insights.changes_summary: Added ARIA attributes and roles to DropdownMenu components

patterns_discovered: Dynamically generating ARIA attributes based on component state
Cloning child elements with additional props
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle both asChild and default rendering scenarios for ARIA attributes
Ensuring disabled states are correctly represented with aria-disabled

accessibility_improvements: Added aria-expanded to show dropdown open/closed state
Added aria-haspopup to indicate menu-like interaction
Added role='menu' to dropdown content container
Added role='menuitem' to individual dropdown items
Added aria-disabled for disabled menu items

recommendations: Consistently apply ARIA attributes across all interactive components
Consider extracting ARIA logic into reusable utility functions
Perform accessibility testing to validate screen reader compatibility
